root.name: Elmo's Number Journey
root.description: OverviewIn Elmo's Number Journey, players take control of Elmo, it is your job to help out Ernie, Cookie Monster, and Count Von Count. Each character has their own linear level to go through where you must collect floating versions of a specific number. If you collect too many of the wrong number then players have to start the level over. Once players get through a level, they are taken to a bonus stage where you must do simple addition or subtraction by throwing balls into the mouth of a massive clown muppet head.

similar_games.game: The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland
Sesame Street: Bert & Ernie's Imagination Adventure
